org.jboss.soa.esb.actions.soap.attachment
Class ImageDataContentHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      org.jboss.soa.esb.actions.soap.attachment.ImageDataContentHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.activation.DataContentHandler
public class ImageDataContentHandler
extends java.awt.Component
implements javax.activation.DataContentHandler

ImageDataContentHandler is a JAF content handler that handles marshalling/unmarshalling between Image objects and a stream. This handler provides support for all mime types handled by the ImageIO implementation on the virtual machine that this class is ran under. These are dynamically registered, so any custom ImageIO plugins are discovered and used. It's important to note that some mime types (for example image/gif) may not have encoding support provided by the ImageIO implementation. If this happens an exception will be thrown indicating the lack of encoding support.

Author:
Jason T. Greene, Magesh Kumar B
See Also:
Serialized Form
